title: Amnesty: A Mysterious and Thrilling Amnesia Romance (Amnesia Duet Finale)
features: There’s freedom in remembering.My past is a double-edged sword.Damned if I remember; damned if I don’t.Recollection beyond the horrors I already have will change me. Change us. But what if I’m living a lie? What if everything I believe is wrong? What if who I thought I was isn’t real?If not her, then…Who am I?Eddie says it doesn’t matter, but deep down, I’m terrified it does.I’m trapped. Held prisoner by a past I can’t remember and a future that may not belong to me.There’s a light, though not at the end of the tunnel… It’s wavering in the distance, calling to me from Rumor Island.That light, it scares me far more than darkness. Am I brave enough to confront it? So many questions, so few answers.I don’t have a choice; the truth always finds a way to the surface. Finally learning who I truly am will be a permanent life sentence.Total punishment or absolute amnesty.
description: "There is something so hauntingly beautiful about this novel even though it's wicked at times to the point of haunting your soul."
"Cambria kept me with my jaw hanging open for almost the entire book. It's pretty fastpaced, gripping, intense, amazing and crazy! I literally could not stop reading."
"An emotional story of survival and unconditional love."

"Mind blowing, riveting and extremely emotional, Eddie and Amnesia's story will certainly take you on a thrilling and extraordinary journey that will stay with you for days on end. Cambria Hebert has created yet another heart-piercing and unputdownable masterpiece in this duet! A definite must read for every reader out there!"
"The writing was amazing and the concept brilliant. If you are looking for an unforgettable and unique story, you should definitely read it!"

"Cambria Hebert amped up the suspense in this novel. I was at the edge of my seat waiting for the next bomb to drop. This conclusion to the Amnesia duet did not disappoint and is a story that's going to stay with me for a very long time."
-Micalea Smeltzer Author of the Willow Creek series.

"One of the best romantic suspense's that I have read this year. The book kept me on edge the whole way - the characters were so strong, real and amazing. The writing was flawless and the story was exciting, emotional and will definitely touch your heart."
"The feelings Cambria provoked with her words is what is going to keep this story and these characters in my mind for months to come."
Amnesty is book two of two in the
duet. Amnesty is available to read for free with kindle unlimited.
includes a recipe for monkey bread muffins - Amnesia's favorite!! Book one of the Amnesia Duet is titled: Amnesia and is available on amazon and is free to read with kindle unlimited.
"There is one thing you will always be able to count on. One thing that will

change." he told me.I tilted my head to the side. "That the sun will always rise?" He shook his head. "More surer than that." "More surer?" I echoed."The surest." My fingers played in the wet curls at the base of his neck, the blue of his eyes was so bright everything else looked black and white. "How much I love you." He whispered, putting his forehead against mine."That will never change.

She was like a bird in a cage. A small fragile creature that craved freedom but didn't understand what it was. Even though the door to the cage was propped open and no one stood in the way of escape, she hesitated... because if she spread her wings and flew away it would be to places unknown.All she knew now was life inside here. She was kept. Hidden away. A beautiful bird, broken and locked up. A beautiful bird that once knew freedom but now only knew inhibition.

Cambria Hebert is an award winning, bestselling novelist of more than thirty books. She went to college for a bachelor's degree, couldn't pick a major, and ended up with a degree in cosmetology. Sorest assured her characters will always have good hair. Besides writing, Cambria loves a caramel latte,staying up late, sleeping in, and watching movies. She considers math human torture and has an irrational fear of birds (including chickens). You can often find her painting her toenails (because she bites her fingernails), or walking her Chihuahuas (the real rulers of the house). Cambria has written within the young adult and new adult genres, penning many paranormal and contemporary titles. She has also written romantic suspense, science fiction, and most recently male/male romance. Her favorite genre to read and write is contemporary romance. A few of her most recognized titles are:

.Recent awards include: Author of the Year, Best contemporary series (The Hashtag Series), Best contemporary book of the year, Best book trailer of the year, Best contemporary lead, Best contemporary book cover of the year. In addition, her most recognized title,

was listed at Buzzfeed.com as a top fifty summer romance read.Cambria Hebert owns and operates Cambria Hebert Books,LLC.You can find out more about Cambria and her titles by visiting her website: cambriahebert.com.
